name: Managed Finance Api
tagline: A .NET C# universal/portable library responsible for fetching all things financial information from various sources on the web.
body:
# ManagedFinanceApi
A .NET C# universal/portable library responsible for fetching all things financial information from various sources on the web.

Initially the data sources will be Yahoo & Google finance, with more to come later on.

This library should be compatible to run on any Windows device.  It can be included to run on an Windows app or hosted as an API on IIS

The vision for this library is to fetch data and/or analyse:
1.	Stock lookup and stock prices
2.	Stock historical prices
3.	Stock information charting
4.	Stock news
5.	Stock research
6.	Exchange information and news
7.	Stock screener
8.	Portfolio management
9.	Future stock price prediction engine (based on past pricing, dividend timing and heuristic news scrapping from the web)

Others such as options, bonds, fx, etc to be added as the library evolves.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
